name: NgAtlanta
description: The annual Angular Conference in Atlanta, Georgia and the largest one on the East Coast. It has been sponsoring by Valor Software for the last 3 years.
solutions: Used Webflow as the main development tool and delivered the solution in a few weeks.
outcome: NgAtlanta website is specifically designed to be a central hub for everything about the annual Angular conference in Atlanta to create a unique experience for the conference's attendees.
